title: Mobile Flipped Learning Program for Strengthening Practitioners' Language Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning environment focused on enhancing work-integrated language proficiency for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners complete over 80% of pre-provided mobile content under the flipped learning model and can summarize key concepts
Learners can lead feedback sessions with peers and solve practical language tasks using real-time collaboration tools (mobile-based).
Learners can create and submit a portfolio of language use strategies applicable in workplace settings through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
